attributes.action: Demand A Fairer Referendum For Scotland in 2016
attributes.additional_details:
An outstanding 45% voted YES to independence. The 55% of Scotland who voted against independence were brainwashed and fear-mongered. Despite the statements made and fears provoked lacked solid proof and substantial background facts.
The referendum was hugely biased, unfair and prejudiced. The BBC and media in Scotland were extremely biased, favouring the No campaign and fear mongering the Scottish public.
Under these pretenses,Scotland stood no chance in the referendum. Scotland was poorly informed and misled.
Demand a fair referendum for Scotland in 2016 and demand that TV and media give unbiased opinions.
